name: The QTG
description:
The Quickly Tank Game, a game made in a hurry

A little videogame created in a week.

Controls:

WASD- move tank

Shift- Sprint

mouse-AimTurret

mouseLeft- shoot

mouseRight - Shield

Escape- Return to Menu

Player 2 in modo Multi

JoystickLeft- move tank

A- Sprint

JoustickRight-AimTurret

LT,LB,RT,RB- shoot

B- Shield

Start- Return to Menu
